                  watchdog_enable PROC
;;;10977  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;10978  void watchdog_enable (void) 
009d54  4992              LDR      r1,|L2.40864|
;;;10979  {
;;;10980  LPC_WDT->WDTC=2000000;
009d56  05c8              LSLS     r0,r1,#23
009d58  6041              STR      r1,[r0,#4]
;;;10981  LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL=0;
009d5a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
009d5c  6101              STR      r1,[r0,#0x10]
;;;10982  LPC_WDT->WDMOD=3;
009d5e  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
009d60  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
;;;10983  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009d62  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
009d64  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10984  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009d66  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009d68  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10985  }
009d6a  4770              BX       lr
;;;10986  
                          ENDP

                  watchdog_reset PROC
;;;10987  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;10988  void watchdog_reset (void) 
009d6c  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
;;;10989  {
;;;10990  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009d6e  0748              LSLS     r0,r1,#29
009d70  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10991  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009d72  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009d74  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10992  }
009d76  4770              BX       lr
;;;10993  
                          ENDP

                  SysTick_Handler PROC
;;;10999  //***********************************************
;;;11000  void SysTick_Handler (void) 	 /* SysTick Interrupt Handler (1ms)    */
009d78  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;11001  {
;;;11002  //sys_plazma++;
;;;11003  b2000Hz=1;
009d7c  4c87              LDR      r4,|L2.40860|
009d7e  2601              MOVS     r6,#1
009d80  3cc2              SUBS     r4,r4,#0xc2
;;;11004  
;;;11005  if(bTPS)
;;;11006  	{
;;;11007  	LPC_GPIO1->FIODIR|=(1UL<<26);
009d82  4888              LDR      r0,|L2.40868|
009d84  7326              STRB     r6,[r4,#0xc]          ;11003
009d86  7de1              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0x17]         ;11005  ; bTPS
009d88  b139              CBZ      r1,|L2.40346|
009d8a  6a01              LDR      r1,[r0,#0x20]
009d8c  f0416180          ORR      r1,r1,#0x4000000
009d90  6201              STR      r1,[r0,#0x20]
;;;11008  	LPC_GPIO1->FIOPIN^=(1UL<<26);
009d92  6b41              LDR      r1,[r0,#0x34]
009d94  f0816180          EOR      r1,r1,#0x4000000
009d98  6341              STR      r1,[r0,#0x34]
                  |L2.40346|
;;;11009  	}
;;;11010  
;;;11011  if(++t0cnt4>=2)
009d9a  f8b41042          LDRH     r1,[r4,#0x42]  ; t0cnt4
009d9e  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
009da0  b209              SXTH     r1,r1
009da2  f8a41042          STRH     r1,[r4,#0x42]
009da6  2902              CMP      r1,#2
009da8  db6f              BLT      |L2.40586|
;;;11012  	{
;;;11013  t0cnt4=0;
009daa  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
009dac  f8a45042          STRH     r5,[r4,#0x42]
;;;11014  b1000Hz=1;
009db0  72e6              STRB     r6,[r4,#0xb]
;;;11015  
;;;11016  	bFF=(char)(GET_REG(LPC_GPIO0->FIOPIN, 27, 1));
009db2  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]
;;;11017  	if(bFF!=bFF_) hz_out++;
009db4  4f79              LDR      r7,|L2.40860|
009db6  f3c060c0          UBFX     r0,r0,#27,#1          ;11016
009dba  7720              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1c]         ;11016
009dbc  7f61              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0x1d]  ; bFF_
009dbe  3f42              SUBS     r7,r7,#0x42
009dc0  4288              CMP      r0,r1
009dc2  d004              BEQ      |L2.40398|
009dc4  f8b71058          LDRH     r1,[r7,#0x58]  ; hz_out
009dc8  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
009dca  f8a71058          STRH     r1,[r7,#0x58]
                  |L2.40398|
;;;11018  	bFF_=bFF;
009dce  7760              STRB     r0,[r4,#0x1d]

;;;11020  if(modbus_timeout_cnt<modbusTimeoutInMills)
